question: Which of the following account can be repatriable?
explanation: Non-Resident (External) Rupee Account Scheme [NRE Account] and Foreign Currency (Non-Resident) Account (Banks) Scheme [FCNR (B) Account] can be repatriable while Non- Resident Ordinary Rupee Account Scheme [NRO Account] is not repatriable except for all current income.
